text: "Can't Stop Lovin' You" is a 2013 song by Aerosmith featuring Carrie Underwood. It is the fourth and final single from their 15th studio album Music from Another Dimension! and was released as a single to adult contemporary radio stations in April 2013. ==References== Category:2013 songs Category:2010s ballads Category:Hard rock songs Category:Country rock songs Category:Aerosmith songs Category:Carrie Underwood songs
title: Can't Stop Lovin' You (Aerosmith song)
